V.iii.2.A.3.b
.
Cataracts
38 CFR 4.79, DC 6027
requires that preoperative cataracts are to be evaluated under the General Rating Formula for Diseases of the Eye.  If cataracts are postoperative in nature, evaluate under the General Rating Formula for Diseases of the Eye if a replacement lens is present (known as pseudophakia).  If there is no replacement lens, evaluate based on aphakia under
38 CFR 4.79, DC 6029
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Conditions of the Eyes
